content:
On January 12, 2026, ElizaOS saw significant progress in core performance, with runtime initialization optimizations leading to up to 40% faster warm starts and the ability to configure embedding dimensions to reduce API calls. The project also expanded its plugin ecosystem with a new submission for x402 micropayments, while the documentation site received numerous dependency updates and a critical markdown rendering fix.

## ‚úÖ Completed Work
### Core Performance & Efficiency
*   Optimized `runtime.initialize()` across `plugin-sql`, `server`, and `core` packages, reducing cold start times by 30% and warm start times by 40% through atomic upserts and parallelization. [elizaos/eliza#6342](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/pull/6342)
*   Added support for configuring the embedding dimension via `EMBEDDING_DIMENSION`, eliminating an expensive ~500ms embedding API call during agent initialization. [elizaos/eliza#6357](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/pull/6357)

### Application Management
*   The issue concerning "Unslop Apps" was closed. [elizaos/eliza#6299](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6299)

## üèóÔ∏è Work in Progress
### New Pull Requests
*   **elizaos-plugins/registry**
    *   New Plugin Submission: `@blockrun/elizaos-plugin` for x402 micropayments. [#248](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/248)
*   **elizaos/elizaos.github.io**
    *   Fix to render markdown in the profile summary card. [#202](https://github.com/elizaos/elizaos.github.io/pull/202)
    *   Dependency update: `zod` from 3.25.76 to 4.3.5. [#212](https://github.com/elizaos/elizaos.github.io/pull/212)
    *   Dependency update: `tailwind-merge` from 2.6.0 to 3.4.0. [#211](https://github.com/elizaos/elizaos.github.io/pull/211)
    *   Dependency update: `@types/node` from 22.19.5 to 25.0.6. [#210](https://github.com/elizaos/elizaos.github.io/pull/210)
    *   Dependency update: `react-markdown` from 9.1.0 to 10.1.0. [#209](https://github.com/elizaos/elizaos.github.io/pull/209)
    *   Dependency update: `eslint-config-next` from 15.1.4 to 16.1.1. [#208](https://github.com/elizaos/elizaos.github.io/pull/208)
    *   Dependency update: `p-retry` from 6.2.1 to 7.1.1. [#207](https://github.com/elizaos/elizaos.github.io/pull/207)
    *   Dependency update: `lint-staged` from 15.5.2 to 16.2.7. [#206](https://github.com/elizaos/elizaos.github.io/pull/206)
    *   Dependency update: `@types/minimatch` from 5.1.2 to 6.0.0. [#205](https://github.com/elizaos/elizaos.github.io/pull/205)
    *   Dependency update: `recharts` from 2.15.4 to 3.6.0. [#204](https://github.com/elizaos/elizaos.github.io/pull/204)
    *   Dependency update: `task-master-ai` from 0.40.1 to 0.41.0. [#203](https://github.com/elizaos/elizaos.github.io/pull/203)

## üêû Issue Triage
### Closed Issues
*   **elizaos/eliza**
    *   Unslop Apps. [#6299](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6299)
